SEARCH
Package org.concordia.macs.State

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
org.concordia.macs.State.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
Edit, End, Play, PlayGame
public abstract class Phase extends Object
Author:
Susmitha Mamula This class manages the different states within the State Pattern in the game.

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap(Connectivity p_connectivity, String[] p_command)
      This method is responsible for loading the map during the Preload state.
      Parameters:
      p_connectivity - the connectivity of the map
      p_command - the commands passed by the user

    • showMap

      public void showMap(ArrayList<Continent> p_continentList, ArrayList<Country> p_countryList, ArrayList<Player> p_playerList)
      This method displays the map in a tabular format.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - the list of continents
      p_countryList - the list of countries
      p_playerList - the list of players in the game

      p_commands - the commands passed by the user
      p_connectivity - the connectivity of the map
